attributes.action: protect nurses from further NMC fee rises
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The regulatory body of Nurses continues to put up it's fees. It has now reached £76 and has gone up vast amounts over the last 5 years alone.

The fees since 1983 are as follows:

1983-2001 £36.00 three yearly
2001-2004 £60.00 three yearly
2004-2006 £129.00 three yearly
2006-2007 £43.00 annually
2007- £76.00 annually

Nurses should not have to pay this much simply for wanting to work in a caring profession, and paying our taxes to contribute to society. Fee rises of this magnitude are unreasonable to say the least.
